problem_names: lemma fsubset[intro!]: "fset A \<subseteq> fset B \<Longrightarrow> A |\<subseteq>| B"
lemma le_nat_any[simp]: "VNat n \<sqsubseteq> v \<Longrightarrow> v = VNat n"
lemma le_any_nat[simp]: "v \<sqsubseteq> VNat n \<Longrightarrow> v = VNat n"
lemma le_nat_nat[simp]: "VNat n \<sqsubseteq> VNat n' \<Longrightarrow> n = n'"
translations: lemma fsubset[intro!]: "fset A \<subseteq> fset B \<Longrightarrow> A |\<subseteq>| B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fset A \<subseteq> fset B \<Longrightarrow> A |\<subseteq>| B
proof (rule fsubsetI)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>fset A \<subseteq> fset B; x |\<in>| A\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x |\<in>| B
fix x

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>fset A \<subseteq> fset B; x |\<in>| A\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x |\<in>| B
assume ab: "fset A \<subseteq> fset B" and xa: "x |\<in>| A"

proof (state)
this:
  fset A \<subseteq> fset B
  x |\<in>| A

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>fset A \<subseteq> fset B; x |\<in>| A\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x |\<in>| B
from xa

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x |\<in>| A
have "x \<in> fset A"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x |\<in>| A

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> fset A
using fmember.rep_eq[of x A]

proof (prove)
using this:
  x |\<in>| A
  (x |\<in>| A) = (x \<in> fset A)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> fset A
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  x \<in> fset A

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>fset A \<subseteq> fset B; x |\<in>| A\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x |\<in>| B
from this ab

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> fset A
  fset A \<subseteq> fset B
have "x \<in> fset B"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> fset A
  fset A \<subseteq> fset B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> fset B
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  x \<in> fset B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>fset A \<subseteq> fset B; x |\<in>| A\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x |\<in>| B
from this

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> fset B
show "x |\<in>| B"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> fset B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x |\<in>| B
using fmember.rep_eq[of x B]

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> fset B
  (x |\<in>| B) = (x \<in> fset B)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x |\<in>| B
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  x |\<in>| B

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
proposition val_le_antisymm: fixes v1::val shows "\<lbrakk> v1 \<sqsubseteq> v2; v2 \<sqsubseteq> v1 \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> v1 = v2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>v1 \<sqsubseteq> v2; v2 \<sqsubseteq> v1\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> v1 = v2
by (induction v1 arbitrary: v2) auto
lemma le_nat_any[simp]: "VNat n \<sqsubseteq> v \<Longrightarrow> v = VNat n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. VNat n \<sqsubseteq> v \<Longrightarrow> v = VNat n
by (cases v) auto
lemma le_any_nat[simp]: "v \<sqsubseteq> VNat n \<Longrightarrow> v = VNat n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. v \<sqsubseteq> VNat n \<Longrightarrow> v = VNat n
by (cases v) auto
lemma le_nat_nat[simp]: "VNat n \<sqsubseteq> VNat n' \<Longrightarrow> n = n'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. VNat n \<sqsubseteq> VNat n' \<Longrightarrow> n = n'
by auto
end
